select a.*, b.store_name, f.price, d.name as place_type_name, e.name as desk_type_name from t_store_desk a join t_store b on a.store_id = b.store_id
left join t_desk_price f on a.desk_type = f.desk_type and a.store_id = f.store_id left join t_desk_place d on a.place_type = d.desk_place_id left join t_desk_type e on a.desk_type = e.desk_type_id
